long_description: The Nitecore Intellicharger i4 battery charger eliminates the need to own multiple battery chargers thanks to its compatibility with almost all types of rechargeable batteries. Microprocessor automatically detects the battery type and selects the appropriate voltage and charge mode. Compatible with lithium-ion 26650, 22650, 18650, 17670, 18490, 17500, 17335, 16340 (RCR123), 14500 and 10440 batteries. Also works with nickel-metal hydride (NiMH) and nickel-cadmium (NiCd) AA, AAA and C batteries; all batteries sold separately. Capable of charging four batteries simultaneously; each battery slot monitors and charges independently. Three-color LED display shows the charging progress for each battery; charging automatically stops when it is complete. Plug the charger into a household outlet with the included cord, or into a vehicle's 12v power source using an adapter (not included). The Nitecore Intellicharger i4 battery charger features reverse polarity protection in case you put the batteries in backwards.
short_description: The Nitecore Intellicharger i4 battery charger eliminates the need to own multiple battery chargers thanks to its compatibility with almost all types of rechargeable batteries.
